You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a kitchen interior with a prominent center island featuring a flat-topped stove. The island has a dark wood finish and is topped with a light-colored countertop. Above the island hangs a decorative light fixture with a dark metal frame. The kitchen has white walls and a hardwood floor. There are windows with white frames allowing natural light to enter the room. The appliances, including a refrigerator, are not visible in the image.

The furniture arrangement suggests a comfortable and inviting living space.
